title: Citi Named Top Asia Equities Research and Sales House by Clients
summary: Hong Kong - Citi was chosen as the top provider of equity research and equities sales in Asia-excluding Japan-in Institutional Investor's (II) 2019 All-Asia Sales Team.
tag-1: Citi Named Top Asia Equities Research and Sales House by Clients
tag-2: Hong Kong – Citi was chosen as the top provider of equity research and equities sales in Asia—excluding Japan—in Institutional Investor's (II) 2019 All-Asia Sales Team.
tag-3: The result was determined based on responses from some 1,600 investment professionals representing more than 650 buy-side firms, who rated providers on their sales coverage across 12 countries and sectors. In a total over 290,000 votes were cast by Asian investment professionals a record for these awards which are regarded as the benchmark for Asian research and sales.
tag-4: This year voters' responses were weighted based on their relevant equity commissions. Citi ranked in the #1 position in 17 out of a total of 34 research categories.
tag-5: In the editorial write up on the award, the magazine said: "Citi's efforts appear to be paying off: In addition to leading the commission-weighted ranking, Citi also topped a second leaderboard weighted by each voting firm's Asian ex-Japan equity assets under management."
tag-6: "These results are a credit to the strong team we have across the region. To excel in Asia you need a diverse team that is well-coordinated across specific country coverage and well connected to regional and global markets. Citi's market leading platform consistently delivers our strong network for clients and I would like to congratulate the whole team on this recognition," said Stuart Staley, Citi's Asia Pacific Head of Markets & Securities Services.
tag-7: Citi ranked in the #1 position in 17 out of a total of 34 categories.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
